items.sentence: It was tremendously exciting to be in Boston at that time.
Tom thinks you\'re good at French, but I know you\'re not.

I don\'t want that and I know you don\'t want that either.
I\'ve always wanted to run a small hotel in the mountains.
I\'ve been thinking about doing this for a very long time.

I\'m surprised that Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom came back from Boston a week earlier than we expected.
